title: Best of The Herd: 12/03/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/03/2019
description:
Colin knows what two teams will reach the Super Bowl and they are remarkably similar. He wonders if the Browns have a Freddie Kitchens issue or a Baker Mayfield issue. He explains why the Seahawks and Vikings game on Monday night was a really bad look for the Cowboys. Plus, Super Bow Champion Trent Dilfer talks about people being so wrong about Russell Wilson and gives Colin grief about being so wrong about the Eagles this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
